!camocat
!!INTRODUCTION
Catalogue of camouflage.
Uses the following technology stack:

# Python
# virtualenv
# Django
# mezzanine
# cartridge

!!OVERVIEW OF SETUP
* http://cartridge.jupo.org/overview.html
* http://docs.aws.amazon.com/elasticbeanstalk/latest/dg/create-deploy-python-django.html

!!STEPS TO CREATE

# `virtualenv camoenv`
# `source camoenv/bin/activate`
# `pip install -U cartridge`
# `pip install bleach`
# `mezzanine-project -a cartridge camocat`
# `cd camocat`
# `python manage.py createdb --noinput`
# `pip freeze > requirements.txt`
# `python manage.py runserver`
# http://127.0.0.1:8000/ (`ctrl+c` to stop)
# `deactivate`
